sections.title: Loremaster (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Loremaster class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Loremaster)
sections.description: Loremasters gain no proficiency with any weapon or armor when taking levels in this prestige class.

sections.title: Spells per Day/Spells Known (Loremaster)
sections.description: When gaining loremaster levels, the character advances spellcasting in a previously held spellcasting class, gaining spells per day and known spells but no other class features.

sections.title: Secret (Loremaster)
sections.description: At specific levels, loremasters choose powerful secrets that grant various abilities, with availability determined by level plus Intelligence modifier.

sections.title: Lore (Loremaster)
sections.description: Loremasters add half their level to all Knowledge skill checks and can make Knowledge checks untrained, stacking with bardic knowledge.

sections.title: Bonus Languages (Loremaster)
sections.description: Loremasters can learn any new language at 4th and 8th level without spending skill points.

sections.title: Languages (Loremaster)
sections.description: This section provides a reference list of languages and the types of creatures that typically speak them.

sections.title: Greater Lore (Ex) (Loremaster)
sections.description: At 6th level, loremasters gain a +10 circumstance bonus on Spellcraft checks when examining magic items to determine their properties.

sections.title: True Lore (Ex) (Loremaster)
sections.description: At 10th level, once per day a loremaster can use their knowledge to replicate legend lore or analyze dweomer spells, with legend lore having a reduced casting time.
